description: "Map of Groot-Atjeh (Aceh, Sumatra), focusing on the area around the capital Kota Radja (Banda Aceh) and along the coasts. There is a list of telephone connections in the area, and an inset map of the region divided into administrative districts."
title: "Overzichtskaart van Groot-Atjeh en aangrenzende kuststaten"
